attributes.action: Vote no confidence in Kier Starmer/ Labour Party
attributes.additional_details: The current prime minister/ Labour Party is dragging the United Kingdom down with it and we as a nation must act now before it is too late .
attributes.background: Kier Starmer needs to leave the position of prime minister, he has lost the confidence in the general public.

rejection.details:
We also can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign this petition:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
